game.title: The Lost Temple of Eldarath
game.objective: Explore the ancient temple and retrieve the artifact known as the Starlight Crystal.
game.description: Rumors have been circulating about a long-abandoned temple hidden deep within the mystical forest of Aethoria. Legends speak of an ancient civilization that once worshiped the stars, and their most prized relic - the Starlight Crystal. Brave adventurers, assemble your gear and uncover the secrets of Eldarath!
game.reward: 1000 gold coins, 200 experience points, and a magical amulet granting resistance to darkness
game.quest-giver: Eira Shadowglow, the village elder of Oakwood

task.objective: Gather information about the temple's location from the villagers of Oakwood.
task.description: Talk to the locals and gather any clues that might lead you to the temple's whereabouts. Be sure to visit the village tavern, as rumors often spread quickly among travelers.

task.objective: Navigate through the treacherous forest of Aethoria and reach the temple's entrance.
task.description: The journey will be perilous, as the forest is home to ferocious beasts and mysterious energies. Stay alert and use your wits to overcome any obstacles that may arise.
